product_name: ExOfficio Sol Cool Halter Dress - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Not just a snazzy looking dress, the ExOfficio Sol Cool Halter Dress is actually engineered to keep you cool and protect you from the sun's harmful rays. So, get packing for your tropical adventure! Icefil(R) fabric uses Xylitol, a natural plant compound, to create a cooling sensation on contact with moisture that lowers body temperature up to 5 degrees. Lightweight fabric also wicks moisture, dries fast and resists odor. Offers outstanding UPF 50+ sun protection from harmful UV rays. Upper front of dress is double lined. Hidden security pocket in side seam holds ID, cash or key. ExOfficio Sol Cool Halter Dress features flatlock stitching and a tagless label to prevent irritation. Closeout.
short_description: Not just a snazzy looking dress, the ExOfficio Sol Cool Halter Dress is actually engineered to keep you cool and protect you from the sun's harmful rays. So, get packing for your tropical adventure!
